docs.title: melodic
docs.description: Multivariate Exploratory Linear Optimised Decomposition into Independent Components
authors: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford

docs.title: Input file
docs.description: Input file names (either single file name or comma-separated list or text file)

docs.title: Mask file
docs.description: File name of mask for thresholding

docs.title: Dimensionality reduction
docs.description: Dimensionality reduction into specified number of dimensions (default is automatic estimation)

docs.title: CIFTI input/output
docs.description: Input/output as CIFTI (warning: auto-dimensionality estimation for CIFTI data is currently inaccurate)

docs.title: Dimensionality estimation technique
docs.description: Use specific dimensionality estimation technique: lap, bic, mdl, aic, mean (default: lap)

docs.title: Separate variance normalization
docs.description: Switch on separate variance normalization for each input dataset (off by default)

docs.title: Disable MIGP
docs.description: Switch off MIGP data reduction when using -a concat (full temporal concatenation will be used)

docs.title: MIGP factor
docs.description: Internal Factor of mem-threshold relative to number of Eigenmaps (default: 2)

docs.title: Number of ICs
docs.description: Number of ICs to extract (for deflation approach)

docs.title: Covariance weights
docs.description: Voxel-wise weights for the covariance matrix (e.g. segmentation information)

docs.title: Minimum rank-1 error change
docs.description: Minimum error change for rank-1 approximation in TICA

docs.title: Max iterations
docs.description: Maximum number of iterations before restart

docs.title: Mixture Model threshold
docs.description: Threshold for Mixture Model based inference

docs.title: No mixture modeling
docs.description: Switch off mixture modeling on IC maps

docs.title: IC components file
docs.description: Input filename of the IC components file for mixture modeling

docs.title: Mixing matrix file
docs.description: Input filename of mixing matrix for mixture modeling / filtering

docs.title: Session modes file
docs.description: Input filename of matrix of session modes for report generation

docs.title: Component filter
docs.description: List of component numbers to remove

docs.title: Background image
docs.description: Specify background image for report (default: mean image)

docs.title: Log power calculation
docs.description: Calculate log of power for frequency spectrum

docs.title: Output thresholded and probability maps
docs.description: Output thresholded maps and probability maps

docs.title: Report maps control
docs.description: Control string for spatial map images (see slicer)

docs.title: melodic
docs.description: Multivariate Exploratory Linear Optimised Decomposition into Independent Components
authors: FMRIB Analysis Group, University of Oxford
